<item><title>[makelist.param1] - [makelist.param2] - [makelist.param3] - [makelist.param4] - [makelist.param5] - [makelist.param6] </title> <link>plugin://program.plexus/?url=$doregex[hash]&mode=1&name=Adryanlist+[makelist.param4]+Arenavision</link> <regex> <name>hash</name> <expres>this.loadPlayer\("(.*?)"</expres> <page>http://www.arenavision.in/AV[makelist.param6]</page> <referer>http://www.arenavision.in</referer> <setcookie>beget=begetok</setcookie> </regex> <thumbnail>https://s29.postimg.org/txckqm8ev/sports.jpg</thumbnail> </item>

<title>[COLOR lightblue][makelist.param1][/COLOR]</title> <link>$doregex[select_Url]</link> <regex> <name>select_Url</name> <expres>$pyFunction: '$doregex[progressive]|User-Agent=Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/52.0.2743.116 Safari/537.36' if not '$doregex[progressive]|User-Agent=Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/52.0.2743.116 Safari/537.36'=='' else '$doregex[hls]|User-Agent=Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/52.0.2743.116 Safari/537.36'</expres> <page></page> </regex> <regex> <name>progressive</name> <expres>x-mpegurl" src="(.*?)"</expres> <page>http://www.liveonlinetv247.info/embed/[makelist.param2].php?width=650&height=480</page> </regex> <regex> <name>hls</name> <expres>x-mpegurl" src="(.*?)"</expres> <page>http://www.liveonlinetv247.info/embed/[makelist.param2].php?width=650&height=480</page> </regex> <thumbnail>https://s29.postimg.org/ft4uzzz4n/sport.jpg</thumbnail>

<item> <title>[makelist.param1] ( [makelist.param2] )</title> <link>$doregex[makelist2]</link> <thumbnail>https://s29.postimg.org/ojsoj485j/sports.jpg</thumbnail>
span class="" >(.*?)<\/span>\n.*?\n\n.*?\n.*?;list=(.*?)" https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEgdi0XIXXZ-qJOFPf4JSKw
makelist2
